mapper.select: SELECT *, users.name username FROM POST_TB posts LEFT JOIN USER_TB users ON posts.userId = users.id LEFT JOIN POST_STATUS_TB status ON posts.postId = status.postId WHERE status.postStatus = 'S' ORDER BY posts.postNum DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT posts.*, users.name username, status.postStatus FROM POST_TB AS posts LEFT JOIN USER_TB AS users ON posts.userId = users.id LEFT JOIN POST_STATUS_TB AS status ON posts.postId = status.postId WHERE posts.postId = #{postId} AND status.postStatus = 'S'
mapper.update: UPDATE POST_STATUS_TB SET postStatus=#{postStatus} WHERE postId=#{postId}
UPDATE POST_TB SET cmtCount = cmtCount+1 WHERE postId=#{postId}
